WorldShapefiles 0.1.0

    üåç WorldShapefiles

    Description

    The WorldShapefiles package provides shapefiles of countries and international borders at level 0. This spatial data is useful for a variety of geographic and data analysis applications.

    Data included

    1. wb_countries

      • Description: Shapefile of the countries of the world (level = 0).

      • Format: SpatialPolygonsDataFrame with 251 observations and 33 variables.

      • Usage:

        data("wb_countries")   
class(wb_countries) # should return "SpatialPolygonsDataFrame".
    2. International_Borders

      • Description: Shapefile of the international borders (level = 0).

      • Format: SpatialLinesDataFrame with international borders remarks.

      • Usage:

        data("International_Borders")   
class(International_Borders) # should return "SpatialLinesDataFrame".

    üì¶ Instalaci√≥n

    La versi√≥n esta en desarrollo de WorldShapefiles directamente desde GitHub utilizando devtools:

    # install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("dvillasanao/WorldShapefiles")
